about_the_game:
LIGHT IS YOUR BEST ALLY :

Strive to survive increasingly tough nights against enemies ever more determined to drag you into darkness. Your flashlight will be your most precious tool. Be sure not to let its battery run out as your life depends on it.

COOPERATE OR HUNT :

Cooperation is the key to survive and the game will encourage players to help each other. However, it will be possible to follow a PVP path, not only as a monster but also as a human. This approach comes with significant drawbacks, including solitude and various "penalties," making it a particularly challenging endeavor.

VICIOUS MONSTERS:

You won't be facing hordes of mindless zombies but rather extremely aggressive monsters capable of cooperating to catch you off guard. Be sure to watch your back to avoid being ambushed by a silently approaching monster.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Horror, Monsters, Frequent Violence
